sentences.text: Notice of 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Meeting Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When and where is the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting is on Thursday, June 15, 2017, at 9:30 a.m., local time, at the Warner Bros.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Studios, 4000 Warner Boulevard, Burbank, California 91522.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Will the Annual Meeting be webcast?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes, the Annual Meeting will be available through a live webcast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information about the webcast can be found on our website at www.timewarner.com/annualmeetingmaterials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who can attend the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders as of the record date and/or their authorized representatives are permitted to attend the Annual Meeting in person by following the procedures described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What do I need to bring or do to attend the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has implemented the following security procedures for the Annual Meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Photo Identification and Admission Ticket.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you attend the Annual Meeting in person, you will be required to present valid, government-issued photo identification, such as a drivers license or passport, and an admission ticket to be admitted to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in your name directly with our transfer agent, Computershare, and you receive your proxy materials by mail, your admission ticket is attached to your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in your name directly with our transfer agent, Computershare, and you receive a notice regarding the availability of proxy materials, the notice is your admission ticket.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in your name directly with our transfer agent, Computershare, and you receive your proxy materials electronically, you will need to print an admission ticket in advance by visiting www.envisionreports.com/TWX and following the instructions there.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the control number found on your email from Computershare regarding the proxy materials to access www.envisionreports.com/TWX.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in an account at a bank, brokerage firm or other nominee, you will need to print an admission ticket in advance by visiting the website listed on your voting instruction form or notice regarding the availability of proxy materials and following the instructions there.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the control number found on your voting instruction form or notice regarding the availability of proxy materials to access the website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have questions regarding these procedures, please contact Time Warner Investor Relations at (866) 211-9605.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional Documentation for an Authorized Representative.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any shareholder representative (for example, of an entity that is a shareholder) must also present satisfactory documentation evidencing his or her authority with respect to the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We reserve the right to limit the number of representatives for a shareholder that can attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Inspection of Packages and Bags.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Packages and bags may be inspected and other measures may be employed to enhance the security of persons attending the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These procedures may require additional time, so please plan your arrival time accordingly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To avoid disruption, admission may be limited once the Annual Meeting begins.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement    99
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What are Time Warners proxy materials for the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our proxy materials, which are available on our website at www.timewarner.com/annualmeetingmaterials, include
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: this Proxy Statement; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our 2016 Annual Report to Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you receive printed versions of these materials by mail (rather than through electronic delivery), the proxy materials also include a proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who can vote at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders of record of Common Stock at the close of business on April 19, 2017 are entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting or any adjournments or postponements of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On April 19, 2017, there were 775,312,872 shares of Common Stock outstanding and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes do I have?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of Common Stock outstanding on the record date is entitled to one vote for each director nominee and one vote on each of the other matters properly presented at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between holding shares as a shareholder of record and as a beneficial owner of shares held in street name?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: hareholder of Record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares of Common Stock are registered in your name directly with our transfer agent, omputershare, you are considered the shareholder of record of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owner of Shares Held in Street Name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in an account at a bank, brokerage firm or other nominee, then you are a beneficial owner of shares held in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that case, you have the right to direct your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee as to how to vote the shares held in your account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What does it mean to vote by proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By submitting your proxy, you authorize the persons named in the proxy (Howard M. Averill, Paul T. Cappuccio and Karen Magee) to vote your shares at the Annual Meeting in accordance with your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may not appoint more than three persons to act as your proxy at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares entitled to vote and represented by properly executed proxies received prior to the Annual Meeting, and not revoked, will be voted as instructed on those proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is not aware of any matters to be presented at the Annual Meeting other than those described in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any other matters are properly presented at the Annual Meeting for consideration, the persons named in the proxy will have discretion to vote on those matters in accordance with their own judgment to the same extent you would be entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the meeting is adjourned or postponed, the persons named in the proxy can vote your shares to adjourn the Annual Meeting and will be authorized to vote at any adjournments or postponements of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with our By-laws, the Annual Meeting may be adjourned, including by the chairman of the meeting, to permit the solicitation of additional proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote my shares?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote your shares of Common Stock (or direct how they will be voted) by Internet, telephone or mail or in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be valid, your vote by Internet, telephone or mail must be received by the deadline specified on the proxy card or voting instruction form, as applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareholder of record:   If you are a beneficial owner of shares held in street name: By Internet (24 hours a day):   www.envisionreports.com/TWX   The website listed on your voting instruction form or the notice regarding the availability of proxy materials By Telephone (24 hours a day):   1-800-652-8683   The telephone number listed on your voting instruction form or the notice regarding the availability of proxy materials By Mail:   Return a properly executed and dated proxy card in the pre-paid envelope we have provided   Return a properly executed and dated voting instruction form by mail, depending on the method(s) your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee makes available In Person at the Annual Meeting:   Return a properly executed and dated proxy card at the Annual Meeting or return a properly executed ballot at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ballots will be distributed at the Annual Meeting to any shareholder who requests a ballot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must obtain a proxy from your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee to vote in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Return a properly executed ballot with a copy of the proxy from your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ballots will be distributed at the Annual Meeting to any shareholder who requests a ballot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I change my vote or revoke my proxy or voting instructions after I have voted or submitted it?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes, you can change your vote before the Annual Meeting, subject to the voting deadlines that are described on the proxy card or voting instruction form, as applicable, by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting again by Internet or by telephone (only your last Internet or telephone proxy or voting instruction submitted prior to the applicable deadline will be counted);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Signing and returning a new proxy card or voting instruction form with a later date; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attending the Annual Meeting and voting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also revoke your proxy by delivering a written notice of revocation to Time Warner Inc., One Time Warner Center, New York, NY 10019-8016, Attention: Corporate Secretary, which must be received no later than 5:00 p.m., Eastern Time, on June 14, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also hand deliver your written notice of revocation or subsequent proxy to the Corporate Secretary at the Annual Meeting before the taking of the vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares of Common Stock in street name, you must contact your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee to change your voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How will my shares be voted if I do not give specific voting instructions?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders of Record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you sign, date and return a proxy card but do not give specific voting instructions, then the proxy holders will vote your shares in the manner recommended by our Board on all matters presented in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement    101
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owners of Shares Held in Street Name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide specific voting instructions to your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee, how your shares will be voted depends on the type of proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2: Ratification of Appointment of Independent Auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the vote on the ratification of the appointment of independent auditor, the NYSE rules provide that if the bank, brokerage firm or other nominee has not received voting instructions from its customer 10 days before the meeting date the bank, brokerage firm or other nominee may vote its customers shares in its discretion on the ratification of independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is known as broker-discretionary voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Other Matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All other proposals are non-discretionary matters under NYSE rules, which means your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee may not vote your shares without voting instructions from you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, you must give your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee instructions for your shares to be voted and included in the vote count.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants in the Time Warner Savings Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold an interest in the Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Fund under the Time Warner Savings Plan, and you
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) sign and return your voting instruction card without indicating your instructions for voting your interest, Fidelity Management Trust Company, as Trustee, will vote your interest in the Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Fund FOR each of the Company proposals described as Proposals 1, 2 and 3 and, in respect of Proposal 4, FOR the option of every one year as the frequency with which shareholders are provided an advisory vote on executive compensation, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) do not return your voting nstruction card, Fidelity Management Trust Company, as Trustee, will vote your interest in the Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Fund in the same proportion as other participants interests for which Fidelity receives voting instructions (excluding interests attributable to accounts transferred from the Time Incorporated Payroll-Based Employee Stock Ownership Plan or the WCI Employee Stock Ownership Plan), except that any interests you hold attributable to accounts transferred from the Time Incorporated Payroll-Based Employee Stock Ownership Plan or the WCI Employee Stock Ownership Plan will not be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a broker non-vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote occurs with respect to non-discretionary matters if a bank, brokerage firm or other nominee that holds shares o Common Stock submits a proxy for the Annual Meeting and does not specify how the persons named in the proxy should vote the shares on non-discretionary matters because the bank, brokerage firm or other nominee did not receive voting instructions from the beneficial holder of the shares on these matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the proposals included in this Proxy Statement (other than the proposal to ratify the appointment of the independent auditor) is a non-discretionary matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are abstentions and broker non-votes counted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not included in the tabulation of the voting results on proposals that require approval of a majority of the votes cast and, therefore, do not have the effect of votes cast either for or against the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the proposals included in this Proxy Statement require approval of a majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum for the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence, in person or by proxy of the holders of a majority of the Common Stock outstanding and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting constitutes a quorum and is necessary for the conduct of business at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares with respect to which a shareholder abstains or there is a broker non-vote are included as present in determining whether a quorum exists at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who counts the votes cast at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Computershare will tabulate the votes cast at the Annual Meeting and act as the independent inspectors of election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I learn the voting results?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will announce the preliminary voting results at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will report the final results in a Current Report on Form 8-K filed with the SEC within four business days following the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who will pay the cost of the solicitation of proxies for the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will pay all expenses of the solicitation of proxies for the Annual Meeting, including the cost of preparing and mailing he Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials and the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to solicitation by mail, our directors, officers and employees may solicit proxies and voting instructions by telephone or other means of communication.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such directors, officers and employees will not be paid additional compensation but may be reimbursed for reasonable out-of-pocket expenses incurred in connection with such solicitation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has retained Morrow Sodali, LLC at an estimated cost of $25,000 plus reimbursement of expenses to assist in the solicitation of proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will also pay the reasonable expenses of banks, brokerage firms and other nominees for mailing the Notices of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials and proxy materials to beneficial owners of shares held of record by such banks, brokerage firms and other nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement    103
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Delivery of Proxy Materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How is Time Warner distributing its proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To expedite delivery, reduce our costs and decrease the environmental impact of our proxy materials, we are using Notice and Access in accordance with an SEC rule, which permits us to provide proxy materials to our shareholders over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On April 28, 2017, we began sending a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials to certain of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice contains instructions on how to access our proxy materials online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice, you will not receive a printed copy of the proxy materials in the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, the Notice instructs you how to access and review online the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice also instructs you how you can submit your proxy or voting instructions via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice and would like to receive a copy of our proxy materials, follow the instructions contained in the Notice to request a copy electronically or in paper form on a one-time or ongoing basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who are not sent the Notice will continue to be sent either a paper or electronic copy of this Proxy Statement and our 2016 Annual Report to Shareholders, which we began mailing to shareholders on April 28, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How will proxy materials be delivered to beneficial owners who share a residence?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial owners of Common Stock at a single address who hold their shares through the same bank, brokerage firm or other nominee will receive only one copy of the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials or a single set of this Proxy Statement and our 2016 Annual Report to Shareholders unless the Company has previously received contrary instructions from any beneficia owner at the address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This practice, known as householding, is designed to reduce printing and postage costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We currently do not household for shareholders of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your household received a single copy of the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials or set of proxy materials, and you would prefer to receive a separate copy, contact Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. at (800) 542-1061 or in writing at Broadridge, Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, NY 11717, and you will promptly be sent a separate copy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would prefer to receive a separate copy for each beneficial owner in the future, or if your household received multiple copies and would prefer to receive a single copy, please contact your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee, or Broadridge.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may request to begin or discontinue householding at any time in the future by contacting your bank, brokerage firm or other nominee or Broadridge.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I sign up for electronic delivery of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement and our 2016 Annual Report to Shareholders are available on our website at: www.timewarner.com/annualmeetingmaterials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to help reduce our costs of printing and mailing future materials, you can agree to access these documents in the future over the Internet rather than receiving printed copies in the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record holders can sign up for electronic delivery at www.computershare.com/investor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial owners who hold shares in street name will need to contact their bank, brokerage firm or other nominee to sign-up for electronic delivery.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once you sign up, you will continue to receive proxy materials electronically until you revoke this preference.

sentences.text: Procedures for Submitting Shareholder Proposals and Director Nominations and Recommendations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Time Warner does not expect to solicit proxies for an annual meeting of shareholders in 2018 because it expects the merger with AT&T to close before year-end 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information provided below is included pursuant to applicable SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 104  Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I submit a proposal for inclusion in the Proxy Statement for the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to Rule 14a-8 under the Exchange Act, shareholders may present proper proposals for inclusion in the Companys proxy statement and for consideration at our next annual meeting of shareholders by submitting their proposals to us in a timely manner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be included for the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders, a proposal must be received by the Company no later than December 29, 2017, and must otherwise comply with the requirements of Rule 14a-8.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I submit a proposal to be brought before the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders that will not be included in the Proxy Statement for that meeting (advance notice provision)?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys By-laws establish an advance notice procedure with regard to certain matters, including shareholder proposals not included in the Companys proxy statement, to be brought before an annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, notice must be received by the Corporate Secretary of the Company not less than 90 days and no more than 120 days prior to the anniversary date of the immediately preceding annual shareholders meeting and must contain specified information concerning the matters to be brought before such meeting and concerning the shareholder proposing such matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, to be presented at the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders, such a proposal must be received by the Company on or after February 16, 2018 but no later than March 18, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the date of the annual meeting is more than 30 days earlier or more than 60 days later than such anniversary date, notice must be received not earlier than the 120th day prior to such annual meeting and not later than the close of business on the later of the 90th day prior to such annual meeting or the 10th day following the day on which public announcement of the date of such meeting is first made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a shareholder who has notified the Company of his or her intention to present a proposal at an annual meeting does not appear or send a qualified representative to present the proposal at such meeting, the Company is not required to present the proposal for a vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I submit a director recommendation to the Nominating Committee?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating Committee has adopted a policy statement regarding its consideration of director candidates recommended by shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating Committees policy is to apply the same criteria in reviewing director candidates, regardless of whether the candidate is suggested or proposed by a shareholder or identified by the Board or another process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a shareholder would like the Nominating Committee to consider an individual as a candidate for election to the Board, the shareholder must submit a written notice (containing the information specified in the Policy Statement Regarding Director Nominations to the Nominating Committee) by no later than September 1 of the year prior to the annual meeting of shareholders with respect to which he shareholder would like the individual to be considered as a potential director nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Policy Statement Regarding Director Nominations may be found on our website at www.timewarner.com/governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I submit a director nomination to shareholders at an annual meeting of shareholders (advance notice provision)?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys By-laws provide that shareholders may nominate individuals for election as directors at an annual meeting of shareholders by complying with the requirements set forth in the By-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the advance notice provision of the By-laws, to be timely and proper, notice of a nomination by a shareholder must be delivered to or mailed to and received at our principal executive offices at least 90 days and no more than 120 days before the first anniversary of the date the annual meeting of shareholders was held the prior year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice must contain specified information concerning the individual(s) the shareholder intends to nominate at the meeting and the shareholder nominating the individual(s).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, to be included in the nominees presented for election to the Board at the Companys 2018 annual meeting (but not included in the Companys proxy materials for the meeting), the notice of nomination must be received by the Company on or after February 16, 2018 but no later than March 18, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the date of the annual meeting is more than 30 days earlier or more than 60 days later than such anniversary date, notice of the nomination by the shareholder must be delivered or received by the Company no earlier than the 120th day before the annual meeting and no later than the close of business on the later of the 90th day prior to the annual
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: meeting or the 10th day after the day on which the date of such annual meeting is first publicly announced.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a shareholder who has given notice of the intention to nominate an individual for election as a director at an annual meeting does not appear at, or send a qualified representative to, such meeting, the Company is not required to present the nominee(s) for vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I submit a director nomination for inclusion in the Companys proxy materials for a future annual meeting of shareholders (proxy access provision)?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2016, the Board adopted amendments to the Companys By-laws to permit a shareholder, or group of up to 20 shareholders, who has owned 3% or more of the Companys outstanding Common Stock continuously for at least three years to nominate, and have included in the Companys annual meeting proxy materials, up to the greater of two individuals or 20% of the number of directors on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any nominees who were previously elected to the Board through the proxy access By-law provision at either of the two most recent annual meetings of shareholders and who are re-nominated as a director nominee by the Board count toward the number of individuals shareholders can nominate pursuant to the proxy access By-law provision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shareholder(s) submitting a nomination and the nominees must satisfy the requirements specified in the proxy access provision of the Companys By-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of proxy access director nominees must be received by the Company at least 150 days and no more than 180 days before the first anniversary of the date the Companys proxy statement was released to shareholders in connection with the most recent annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, proxy access nominations for our 2018 annual meeting must be received by the Company on or after October 30, 2017 and no later than November 29, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where should I send my shareholder proposal and director nominations or recommendations?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All proposals and director nominations or recommendations by shareholders, whether or not to be included in the Companys proxy materials for the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders, should be sent to the attention of the Corporate Secretary of the Company at One Time Warner Center, New York, NY 10019-8016.

sentences.text: NON-GAAP FINANCIAL MEASURES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company utilizes Adjusted Operating Income (Loss), Adjusted Operating Income margin and Adjusted EPS, among other measures, to evaluate the performance of its businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These measures are considered important indicators of the operational strength of the Companys businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some limitations of Adjusted Operating Income (Loss), Adjusted Operating Income margin and Adjusted EPS are that they do not reflect certain charges that affect the operating results of the Companys businesses and they involve judgment as to whether items affect fundamental operating performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company uses Free Cash Flow to evaluate the performance and liquidity of its businesses and considers Free Cash Flow when making decisions regarding strategic investments, dividends and share repurchases.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company believes Free Cash Flow provides useful information to investors because it is an important indicator of the Companys liquidity, including its ability to reduce net debt, make strategic investments, pay dividends to common shareholders and repurchase stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company uses ROIC to measure the performance of its businesses, including the Companys capital efficiency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company also uses ROIC in the individual performance goals for certain NEOs as a measure of their performance on capital allocation goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A general limitation of these measures is that they are not prepared in accordance with GAAP and may not be comparable to similarly titled measures of other companies due to differences in methods of calculation and excluded items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted Operating Income (Loss), Adjusted EPS, Free Cash Flow and ROIC should be considered in addition to, not as a substitute for, the Companys Operating Income (Loss), Diluted Income per Common Share from Continuing Operations, various cash flow measures (e.g., Cash Provided by Operations from Continuing Operations) and Return on Assets, as well as other measures of financial performance and liquidity reported in accordance with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Definitions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted Operating Income (Loss) is defined as Operating Income (Loss) excluding the impact of noncash impairments of goodwill, intangible and fixed assets; gains and losses on operating assets (other than deferred gains on sale-leasebacks); gains and losses recognized in connection with pension and other postretirement benefit plan curtailments or settlements; external costs related to mergers, acquisitions or dispositions (including restructuring and severance costs associated with dispositions), as well as contingent consideration related to such transactions, to the extent such costs are expensed; amounts related to securities litigation and government investigations; and the foreign currency losses during the three months ended December 31, 2014 and March 31, 2015, related to the translation of net monetary assets denominated in Venezuelan currency resulting from the Companys change to the SICAD 2 exchange rate beginning December 31, 2014 and the Simadi exchange rate during the quarter ended March 31, 2015, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning with periods ending on or after October 1, 2016, Adjusted Operating Income (Loss) is defined as Operating Income (Loss) excluding the impact of noncash impairments of goodwill, intangible and fixed assets; gains and losses on operating assets (other than deferred gains on sale-leasebacks); gains and losses recognized in connection with pension and other postretirement benefit plan curtailments or settlements; costs related to the Merger (including retention, restructuring and severance costs associated with the transaction); external costs related to mergers, acquisitions or dispositions (including restructuring and severance costs associated with dispositions), as well as contingent consideration related to such transactions, to the extent such costs are expensed; amounts related to securities litigation and government investigations; and the foreign currency losses during the three months ended December 31, 2014 and March 31, 2015 related to the translation of net monetary assets denominated in Venezuelan currency resulting from the Companys change to the SICAD 2 exchange rate beginning December 31, 2014 and the Simadi exchange rate during the quarter ended March 31, 2015, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted Operating Income margin is defined as Adjusted Operating Income divided by revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement    A-1
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annex A
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted Divisional Pre-Tax Income is defined as Adjusted Operating Income plus Income (loss) from equity method investments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted EPS is defined as Diluted Income per Common Share from Continuing Operations attributable to Time Warner Inc. common shareholders with the following items excluded from Income from Continuing Operations attributable to Time Warner Inc. common shareholders: noncash impairments of goodwill, intangible and fixed assets and investments; gains and losses on operating assets (other than deferred gains on sale-leasebacks), liabilities (including extinguishments of debt) and investments, in each case including associated costs of the transaction; gains and losses recognized in connection with pension and other postretirement benefit plan curtailments or settlements; external costs related to mergers, acquisitions, investments or dispositions (including restructuring and severance costs associated with dispositions), as well as contingent consideration related to such transactions, to the extent such costs are expensed; amounts related to securities litigation and government investigations; the foreign currency losses during the three months ended December 31, 2014 and March 31, 2015, related to the translation of net monetary assets denominated in Venezuelan currency resulting from the Companys change to the SICAD 2 exchange rate beginning December 31, 2014 and the Simadi exchange rate during the quarter ended March 31, 2015, respectively; and amounts attributable to businesses classified as discontinued operations; as well as the impact of taxes and noncontrolling interests on the above items and the Companys share of the above items with respect to equity method investments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning with periods ending on or after October 1, 2016, Adjusted EPS is Diluted Income per Common Share from Continuing Operations attributable to Time Warner Inc. common shareholders with the following items excluded from Income from Continuing Operations attributable to Time Warner Inc. common shareholders: noncash impairments of goodwill, intangible and fixed assets and investments; gains and losses on operating assets (other than deferred gains on sale-leasebacks), liabilities (including extinguishments of debt) and investments, in each case including associated costs of the transaction; gains and losses recognized in connection with pension and other postretirement benefit plan curtailments or settlements; costs related to the Merger (including retention, restructuring and severance costs associated with the transaction); external costs related to mergers, acquisitions, investments or dispositions (including restructuring and severance costs associated with dispositions), as well as contingent consideration related to such transactions, to the extent such costs are expensed; amounts related to securities litigation and government investigations; the foreign currency losses during the three months ended December 31, 2014 and March 31, 2015 related to the translation of net monetary assets denominated in Venezuelan currency resulting from the Companys change to the SICAD 2 exchange rate beginning December 31, 2014 and the Simadi exchange rate during the quarter ended March 31, 2015, respectively; and amounts attributable to businesses classified as discontinued operations; as well as the impact of taxes and noncontrolling interests on the above items and the Companys share of the above items with respect to equity method investments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For periods ending on or after July 1, 2012, Free Cash Flow is defined as Cash Provided by Operations from Continuing Operations plus payments related to securities litigation and government investigations (net of any insurance recoveries), external costs related to mergers, acquisitions, investments or dispositions (including restructuring and severance costs associated with dispositions), to the extent such costs are expensed, contingent consideration payments made in connection with acquisitions, and excess tax benefits from equity instruments, less capital expenditures, principal payments on capital leases and partnership distributions, if any.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For periods ending prior to that date, Free Cash Flow is defined as Cash Provided by Operations from Continuing Operations plus payments related to securities litigation and government investigations (net of any insurance recoveries), external costs related to mergers, acquisitions, investments or dispositions, to the extent such costs are expensed, and excess tax benefits from equity instruments, less capital expenditures, principal payments on capital leases and partnership distributions, if any.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A change to the definition of Free Cash Flow for periods prior to July 1, 2012 to adjust for contingent consideration payments made in connection with acquisitions would have had no impact on the reported Free Cash Flow for such periods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ROA is calculated as Net Income divided by Average Total Assets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ROIC is defined as Net operating profit after taxes (NOPAT) divided by Average Capital Employed excluding purchase price adjustments (PPA).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOPAT represents the Adjusted Operating Income before amortization expense, net of tax at the Companys adjusted effective tax rate plus equity income (loss), net of taxes from investments accounted for under the equity method adjusted for the Companys share of items effecting comparability relating to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Studios in Burbank, California
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FROM DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Take the 110 North to the 101 Hollywood Freeway North and exit at Barham Boulevard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Turn right on Barham Boulevard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The street name becomes Olive Avenue.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continue on Olive Avenue around Studio property.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Turn right to enter Gate 4 (at Olive Avenue and Hollywood Way).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FROM I-5 (TRAVELING EITHER NORTH OR SOUTH):
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Take the I-5 Golden State Freeway to the 134 Ventura Freeway West and exit at Hollywood Way.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the traffic light, turn left on Alameda Avenue.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the first traffic light, turn left on Hollywood Way.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cross Olive Avenue and enter Gate 4 (at Olive Avenue and Hollywood Way).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FROM WEST LOS ANGELES, LOS ANGELES INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT OR SANTA MONICA AREA:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Take the I-405 San Diego Freeway North to the 101 Hollywood Freeway South.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After the exit for Laurel Canyon stay in the far left lane and merge onto the 134 Ventura Freeway East.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exit at Pass Avenue.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Go South (right) on Pass Avenue to Olive Avenue.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Turn left on Olive Avenue and continue on Olive Avenue around Studio property.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Turn right to enter Gate 4 (at Olive Avenue and Hollywood Way).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Return Directions 134 WEST  Exit Gate 4/Hollywood Way and turn right on Alameda.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 134 EAST  Exit Gate 4/Hollywood Way and turn left on Riverside Drive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must provide instructions to the Trustee by June 12, 2017 for your instructions to be tabulated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may issue instructions by telephone or the Internet until 11:59 P.M. (Eastern Time) on that day.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are sending instructions by mail, the Trustee must receive your executed instruction card by 5:00 P.M. (Eastern Time) on June 12, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you submit your instructions by telephone or the Internet, there is no need to mail back your instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide instructions to the Trustee, the Trustee will vote your interests as required by the terms of the applicable Plan as described on the reverse side of the card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may send your voting instructions to the Trustee via the Internet, telephone or mail, as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: www.proxyvote.com
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Use the Internet to transmit your voting instructions and for electronic delivery of information up until 11:59 P.M. (Eastern Time) on June 12, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Have your voting instruction card in hand when you access the web site and follow the instructions to obtain your records and to create an electronic voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Use any touch-tone telephone to transmit your voting instructions up until 11:59 P.M. (Eastern Time) on June 12, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Have your voting instruction card in hand when you call and then follow the instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROVIDE VOTING INSTRUCTIONS BY MAIL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mark, sign and date your voting instruction card and return it in the postage- paid envelope we have provided or return it to Broadridge, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, NY 11717.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ELECTRONIC DELIVERY OF FUTURE SHAREHOLDER COMMUNICATIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to reduce the costs incurred by Time Warner Inc. in mailing proxy materials, you can consent to receive all future proxy statements, voting instruction cards and annual reports electronically via e-mail or the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To sign up for electronic delivery, please follow the instructions on the reverse side to vote using the Internet and, when prompted, indicate that you agree to receive or access shareholder communications electronically in future years.

sentences.text: Instructions solicited by Fidelity Management Trust Company on behalf of the Board of Directors for the Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Meeting of Shareholders on June 15, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The undersigned hereby instructs Fidelity Management Trust Company (Fidelity), as Trustee, to vote as specified on the reverse side by proxy at the Annual Meeting of Shareholders of Time Warner Inc. to be held on June 15, 2017, and at any adjournment thereof, the undersigneds proportionate interest in the shares of Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Common Stock held in the Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Fund under the Time Warner Savings Plan (the Plan).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the provisions of the Trust relating to the Plan, Fidelity, as Trustee, is required to request your confidential instructions as to how your proportionate interest in the shares of Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Common Stock held in the Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Fund under the Plan (an interest) is to be voted at the Annual Meeting of Shareholders on June 15, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your instructions to Fidelity will not be divulged to anyone at Time Warner Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If Fidelity does not receive your instructions on or prior to 5:00 P.M. (Eastern Time) via a voting instruction card or 11:59 P.M. (Eastern Time) via telephone or the Internet on June 12, 2017, your interest, if any, attributable to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) accounts transferred from the Time Incorporated Payroll-Based Employee Stock Ownership Plan (PAYSOP) and the WCI Employee Stock Ownership Plan (WCI ESOP) will not be voted and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the remainder of the accounts in the Plan will be voted at the Annual Meeting in the same proportion as other participants interests in the Plan for which Fidelity has received voting instructions (excluding PAYSOP and WCI ESOP accounts).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If this card is signed but no direction is made, Fidelity will vote the undersigneds proportionate interest FOR all nominees listed, FOR Proposals 2 and 3, and for every 1 YEAR on Proposal 4.

sentences.text: The undersigned hereby acknowledges receipt of the Time Warner Inc.

sentences.text: Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement and hereby constitutes and appoints Howard M. Averill, Paul T. Cappuccio and Karen Magee, and each of them, its true and lawful agents and proxies, with full power of substitution in each, to attend the Annual Meeting of Shareholders of Time Warner Inc. on Thursday, June 15, 2017, and any adjournment or postponement thereof, and to vote on the matters indicated all the shares of Common Stock that the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present.
